name: Fresh Strawberry Upside Down Cake
author: parealtor313
summary: I live in Florida and have access to strawberries for a few months at a time.  Many of my friends and neighbors can't wait until I start preparing this cake.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package strawberry flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (18 ounce) package yellow cake mix, batter prepared as directed on package
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread crushed strawberries on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking pan
Evenly sprinkle strawberries with the dry gelatin powder, and top with mini marshmallows
Prepare the cake mix as directed on the package, and pour on top of the marshmallows
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 40 to 50 minutes
Cool in the pan for 15 minutes
Run a knife around the pan to loosen the sides, and turn the cake out onto a serving tray
